mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (auth_no, account_id, account_pw, account_name) VALUE (#{author}, #{accountId}, #{accountPw}, #{name})

INSERT INTO account_info (account_no, account_gender, bir_date, phone, email, post_num, address, address_detail) VALUE (#{accountNo}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{postNum}, #{address}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT u.account_name ,i.* FROM account AS u JOIN account_info AS i ON u.account_no = i.account_no WHERE u.account_id = #{ accountId }
